name: aerleon
description: Generate firewall configs for multiple firewall platforms

readme.summary: Excellent clarity and installation instructions, but lacks inline quick-start examples and relies heavily on external documentation for configuration and troubleshooting.
readme.top_issue: No inline quick-start example showing basic usage - users must click through to external documentation to see what a simple Aerleon policy looks like or how to actually run the tool

injection_risks.description: The error message is printed to stderr, but it does not contain any sensitive information.
The SetSourceAddress and SetDestAddress methods do not validate the input addresses. This could lead to potential security issues if an attacker can manipulate these inputs.
The SetSourcePorts and SetDestPorts methods do not validate the input port ranges. This could lead to potential security issues if an attacker can manipulate these inputs.
The SetProtocol method does not validate the input protocol number. This could lead to potential security issues if an attacker can manipulate this input.

critical_findings: Input validation issues in SetSourceAddress, SetDestAddress, SetSourcePorts, SetDestPorts, and SetProtocol methods
Potential error exposure through error message printed to stderr
security.summary: The code has some security concerns related to input validation and potential error exposure, but no critical secrets or injection risks were found.

common_complaints: Protocol and service port mapping bugs affecting multiple generators (Cisco, Arista, NX-OS)
Missing feature support in generators (Paloalto profile_setting, log_start; Proxmox established keyword)
Type annotation inconsistencies causing validation issues
sentiment.summary: Active project with functional users reporting genuine bugs and missing features, but addressing issues at a measured pace with some technical debt in type definitions and generator support gaps.

communication.summary: The maintainer responses are clear, helpful, and patient. They provide technical depth and encourage new contributors.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being only 4 days ago (indicates repository was recently updated but is now stale)
73 open issues with no resolution activity
No closed issues in past 6 months
No open or merged PRs in past 6 months
No active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests lack of release management
positive_signals: Repository exists and has recent activity (last commit Jan 9, 2026)
maintenance.summary: The aerleon package appears abandoned with no maintenance activity over the past 6 months despite a recent commit, indicating the project is not actively maintained.

governance.summary: The documentation lacks clear succession plans, decision-making processes, and paths for contributors to become maintainers, indicating a high risk of bus factor.

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The README provides a good overview of the package and its features, but lacks concise examples and troubleshooting guidance.
concerns: Docs: Lack of clear, step-by-step quick start example and comprehensive troubleshooting section
Governance: High bus factor risk identified
Security: Input validation issues in SetSourceAddress, SetDestAddress, SetSourcePorts, SetDestPorts, and SetProtocol methods
Security: Potential error exposure through error message printed to stderr
highlights: Recent commits and releases in the past month
Multiple contributors active over the past six months
A significant number of merged PRs indicating ongoing development
